title: Behind the Idea #55: Shorting The Nasdaq, A Trading Diary In One Act
description: It's a special edition of Behind the Idea, as we're talking about our own book. Specifically, Mike's position in the ProShares Short QQQ ETF (PSQ), an inverse ETF for the Nasdaq 100 (QQQ). A short-term oriented, ETF position based on a technical/momentum strategy: it seems like an anathema to the typical Behind the Idea fare. But there's a method to Mike's madness, and we try to pick it apart.
itunes:title: Shorting The Nasdaq, A Trading Diary In One Act
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: How does a short-term trade work for a long term investor?
